title: Long period players
body:
Well I have been playing League for 5 years now and I had an idea crossing my mind what if players that have been faithfull to your since the last 4 or 3 years will have a gift a skin or a summoner icon or players that have reached 1000 wins wins as well.

 Thanks

replies.body: Im playing since season 1, but not having the same account. How is this fair towards me? :o
I think being locked out of things is a big point of a permaban tbh.
It's a stupid thing u mean
It's mean to be a punishment, and being locked out of things is a big part of the punishment. That's why you don't get season rewards for boxes after you've been recently banned.
It's called a game. Which means what you say it's stupid. You shouldn't be rewarded for been a snob, but for your skill and achievements.

It's not really being rewarded for being a snob so much as punished for being nasty towards people. It's great to have skills and know how to play the game, but being skilled doesn't excuse somebody from being an ass.

Really? Then why soldiers get rewarded for their deeds even if they are ass holes? Why politicians get their salary even if they are ass holes? Kind of funny logic there.

PS punishing me for been meet to people who wish me cancer isn't a reason to punish my skill. Snob logicist

Why are you bringing up professions into this? You're not hired by Riot, they're offering you a service that specifically comes with the condition that you'll observe their behavior guidelines. If you're unable or unwilling to behave according to their standards, they don't want to offer you their service. It's as simple as that. If you don't like their conditions, you're free to play a game that has different standards.

worst answer I ever had... Im not allowed to compare to jack when it is 100% defending my point, but in few days you'll compare like that with something and bang suddenly it's legit... Double standards much?
Wait are you making an argument based on what you think I'll do in the future? Complaining about future double standards? What insane breed of logic is this?

No, I'm making an argument based on personal experience. This is how your type works and now the only reason you will avoid making just comparisons in the future is because you know, I'll be right and you don't want me to be right. Because me been right means you are wrong and you can't have that now, can you?

>An appeal to hypocrisy is a logical fallacy in which one attempts to discredit an opponent’s position by showing that the person making the argument has been unable to act in accordance with the position being argued for. By showing the person to be acting in a hypocritical manner, it is hoped that the audience will no longer take the argument seriously and that the argument will be dismissed

http://www.psychologyconcepts.com/appeal-to-hypocrisy-fallacy/

Even if I did do that in the future like you seem to be sure I will, it wouldn't make my argument any less right. Arguments are independent from the person making the argument. If I say you shouldn't smoke because it causes cancer, then get caught smoking, I'll be a hypocrite. But my being a hypocrite won't make smoking any less cancerous and my advice to stop smoking will still be correct. 

I have no idea where you're trying to get at with this tbh.
Starts an argument with. Acts like it's all my fault...
I sincerely have no idea.
*sigh* why do i even bother (-10 votes inc)
Fault for what? I'm not assigning blame to anyone. There's nothing to blame anyone for in the first place.

you get the victorious skins from earlyer seasons. should be enough. be grateful for what you already get for free. asking for more is rude.

Only games that want players to stick around reward them for long term play.  LoL's marketing mix is targeted at keeping people for only a year or two because that's when you are most likely to spend the bulk of money you will spend on the game.  Then they want you to leave to clear up server space for other new people who will spend more money.  

Riot doesn't give a shit about the players (if they did they wouldn't have the most toxic community of any online game, and would have listened to the community about something by now)

Little annoyed at the moment.  played a few games and almost all of  them had one or more toxic jerks/afk/troll in it.  I've been out of the loop, has riot done anything to fix the harassment in games?
